dc_title_s: Map of Central Asia : comprising Bokhara, Cabool, Persia, the River Indus, and the countries eastwards of it
dc_description_s: Relief indicated by hachures.; Constructed from numerous authentic documents, but principally from the original M.S. surveys of Lieut. Alexr. Burnes ...|47 x 73 Centimeters|Scale [ca. 1:4,500,000]. Geographical miles 60 = 1 degree. English miles 69.12 = 1 degree.|General Map Collection
